name: plants
author: HhahtSoss
notes: Solemn scolding + prescience skill were huge surprise factors for my opponents. You usually win within 5 turns anyways so it's a better version of aroma strategy imo. Since you can only use solemn scolding once with your available life points, prescience helps you plan ahead for the bs you'll have to deal with next turn. 5-0 L3 to KOG
